creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: rear view of abstracted pear-shaped figure at LR seated behind low table; near center, converging lines resemble abstracted, scattered papers; blocks of inscription weave back and forth down scroll, ending in vertical inscription down LL edge
markings: LLQ: [  東蕪 ] (Tōbu); LLQ: [ 蕪玉書画 ] (Bugyoku shoga); URC
title: Figure with Inscription
